name: MiS-FiTS
description:
Larice is kicked out of her home and forced to brave the cold of her homeland. She falls into a cavern, and needs to find a way out. Along the way she meets some new friends, who are outcasts just like her.

Disclaimer! this was the first RPG Maker game I ever made! it takes heavy inspiration from Space Funeral, but with the sequel being in the works, I've decided to rework some of those old elements to be a little less derivative.
